channel.title: [HELP] object adding, npc facing (without deletion), and teleport emotes

item.title: [HELP] object adding, npc facing (without deletion), and teleport emotes
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

i was wonderin if someone could help me with my server. I am trying to add obelisks of fire to the mage arena for a path to some jads im placing there, but i dont know the command/cfg to do it. also, i cant seem to get the tele emotes to the duel arena and the mage arena. here is what i have for the teles:

public void emoteBow() // Duel { if(!isWild()) { tele(3343,3230); sendMessage("Duel!"); } else if (isWild()) { sendMessage("You must not be in a wilderness area."); } }

public void emoteAngry() // Jad
{
tele(3087,3933);
sendMessage(“You have now reached the Jad lair.”); }
}

finally, i have some heros at the ramp to the center to the mage arena, but they are facing south, not west like i want. where do i change the direction?

thx, R4ND0M

Read full topic
